title: Classic Large 1 Bedroom !!!Must See @ Spectrum
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO SPECTRUM APARTMENTS', 'Enjoy quality living at Spectrum Apartment Homes.', 'Located in west Las Vegas, NV, near Spring Valley.', 'Spectrum is ideal for those seeking the ultimate in comfort and convenience.', 'Living at Spectrum means everything that you need and love is close at hand.', 'Our central location puts you just minutes away from local schools, fine dining, entertainment attractions and fabulous shopping.', 'Our one, two and two bedroom town home floor plans were thoughtfully designed with your comfort and convenience in mind.', 'All of our apartment home rentals are appointed with a wide array of highly desirable amenities including air conditioning, spacious walk-in closets, a well-equipped kitchen, ceiling fans, intrusion alarms and more!', 'Our thoroughly pampered residents live a life of luxury here at Spectrum Apartment Homes.', 'Relax by our resort-style pool, enjoy a nice work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center, or entertain family and friends in the lavish clubhouse.', 'Whatever your lifestyle may be, here at Spectrum Apartment Homes there is something for everyone!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 724 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Air Conditioning', '- Two Tone Paint', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Washer/Dryer In-Unit', '- Quartz and/or Military Discounts', '- Yoga Classes', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- Furniture Rentals Available via CORT', '- DVD Service', '- Soothing Spa', '- Clubhouse', '- Video Library', '- Dry Cleaning Services', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Covered Parking', '- Copy & Fax Services', '- Updated Moving Partner', '- Public Parks Nearby', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Spectrum Apartments', '9242 W. Russell Rd.', '#102 , Las Vegas, NV, 89148', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', '8vcFeaINf']
